description: This file defines an Angular component named TicTacToeBoardComponent, which manages and displays a 3x3 Tic Tac Toe game board. It handles user interactions such as clicking on cells and highlights the winning combination.

classes.name: TicTacToeBoardComponent
classes.description: An Angular component that displays a Tic Tac Toe game board, handles user input, and highlights the winning cells.

methods.name: handleCellClick
methods.description: Handles click events on cells; emits the cell index if the board is active and the cell is empty.

methods.name: isWinningCell
methods.description: Returns true if the specified cell index is part of the winning combination.
